\begingl[glneveryline={\EnglishGlossA,\EnglishGlossB}]
If[] the[] day[] is[] a[] certain[] one[] of[] the[] fourteenth[] (day[] Uposathas),[] fifteenth[] (day[] Uposathas),[] or[] the[] Unity[] (-Uposathas),[] like[] today[] is[] the[] fifteenth[] day[] Uposatha.[]
